title: something wrong when i uninstall the game shows error
body:
when i press uninstall 
it shows 
An error {-5005: 0x80070002} has occurred while running the setup.
Please make sure you have finished any previous setup and closed other applications.
If the error still occurs, please contact your vendor : Riot Games (http://www.RiotGames.com).

replies.body:
That's interesting, I've never heard of this type of error at *uninstall*. If you still see this error after a quick PC reboot, I'd recommend using an advanced uninstaller program like [**Wise**](http://www.wisecleaner.com/wise-program-uninstaller.html) or [**Glary.**](http://www.glarysoft.com/absolute-uninstaller/)

Please inform me if this worked for you.
